sprite

Interface ImgUpload

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DesktopImgUpload

    public interface ImgUpload
    The interface for all possible image uploading classes (for different devices).
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getFile()
      Get the file used to construct this instance.
      Img getImg(java.lang.String fileName)
      Get an image file
      Img getRotatedImg(java.lang.String fileName, int degree)
      Get a rotated image file.

    • Method Detail

      • getImg

        Img getImg(java.lang.String fileName)
        Get an image file
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name, not including any directories or the full path.
        Returns:
        The image if it exists.

      • getRotatedImg

        Img getRotatedImg(java.lang.String fileName,
                int degree)
        Get a rotated image file. This is the recommended way to rotate an image, as it ensures that only one copy of the rotated image is created. Use this method instead of Img.getRotatedInstance(int).
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name, not including any directories or the full path.
        degree - The degree [0-360]
        Returns:
        The image if it exists.

      • getFile

        java.io.File getFile()
        Get the file used to construct this instance.
        Returns:
        The directory
